attributes.action: Return Wellington's travelling chest to the Wellesley family to be placed on public view at Apsley House, and permanently loan William Pitt's desk to the V&A
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Items such as Wellington's travelling chest and the desk of William Pitt the Younger are items of national significance, and should therefore be available for public view, and not just the enjoyment of a select few residents, staff and visitors to 10 Downing Street.
